name: MODEL ONE
description: Model One is a truly state of the art vacuum tube car amplifier to create an ultimate, tube driven amplifier with enough power to drive any speaker load, and provide a musical experience unlike never before. Model One redefined all expectations of what is possible from an amplifier in music playback system.  Listening to Model One in a high performance system is a transformative experience under total control, speakers disappear and transport the listener into a three-dimensional realm where music takes on a palpable, tangible form. Details from source material are resolved against a black background, painting images in the space with vivid reality and magic mids, silky uppers. Bass becomes the foundation on which this living performance develops, produced with startling tembral accuracy. Here is the breath of the performer.

children.name: OUTPUT TRANSFORMER
children.description:
This custom hand built transformer made in U.S.A  has healty low frequency inductive (over 1000 henries at 60 Hz), high resistance to distortion caused by output tube imbalance, and low distortion overall.

 

We do not give any further technical information on our output transformers, as we do not wish to take part in technical competitions, our products are designed to criteria which are and will be understood fully only once they are listened to!

children.name: RESISTORS
children.description:
•This PR9372 metal film ( Ni-Chrome thin film ) resistor family ( 0.25, 0.5 and 1 watt types ) has been specially designed to support audio "signal path" circuit applications.

 

•The PR9372 has special construction features that promote desired no/low noise (thermal EMF) charecteristics required in high- end audio application circuitry.

 

•Additionally, the materials and craftsmanship used to produce the PR9372 Audio resistor allow for flat frequency response, low distortion, and excellent definition.

 

•In fact, the exact"for this AUDIO-GRADE resistor was determined only after exhaustive listening tests were performed by well- know high-end audio manufacturer who auditioned 10 different prototypes - all of which had a unique blen of materials and manufacturing techniques.

 

•These premium resistors are manufactured in Mediapolis,Iowa U.S.A by Precision Resistive Products Inc. and have been designed into many high-end audio products around the world.

children.name: CAPACITORS
children.description:
•Auricap XO precision wound high resolution metalized polypropylene capacitors, made in U.S.A Specializing for the finest designed. Auricap XO is the result of rigorous consideration of every aspect in capacitor design and manufacturing process. Auricap XO has reconsidered a host of parameters including tension windings, baking times and cryogenic treatment amoung other proprietary procedures. Auricap XO is made using finest obtainable polypropylene film and new high purity continuous cast copper leads. This capacitor design changed a new level of performance is reached with even less coloration, micro-phonics and noise contribution than the famous Auricap. There are no drawbacks to the Auricap XO in comparison to the standard Auricap. Users can still expect all of the wonderful virtues for the standard Auricap is know.

 

" I wasn't sure how you can improve upon something that is so good already - The original Auricap. Was in for a nice surprise! WOW! The best I can describe the new Auricap XO compare to the other capacitors design is like listening to a regular copper cable and then to a very pure OFC high-end cable. Everything is improve,but most dramatic is the naturalness combined with extream 3D detail and air resulting in a bigger soundstage, yet so smooth and relaxed !"

children.name: STATE OF THE ART
children.description: • Model One and Model Two MK III is truly state of the art vacuum tube car amplifier to create an ultimate, tube driven amplifier with enough power to drive any speaker load, and provide a musical exprience unlike never before. Model One redefined all expectation of what is possible from an amplifier in music playback system. Listening to Model One  and Model Two MK III in a high performance system is a transformative exprience; under total control. speakers disappear and transport the listener into a three-dimansional realm where music takes on a palpable, tangible form. Details from source material are resolved against a black background, painting images in the space with vivid reality and magic mids, silky uppers. Bass become the foundation on which this living performance develops, produced with startling tembral accuracy. Here is the breath of the performer.

children.name: MONOCOQUE CHASSIS CONSTRUCTION DESIGN
children.description: • CNC machine monocoque chassis construction is designed to avoid structure boom vibrations . These vibrations create various colorations and distortions that blur or veil the music, confuse the image and generally wreak sonic havoc. To eliminate all structural vibrations we use a solid aluminum block cut by CNC machine, with the hand finishing alone, taking 2 hours to complete. As mentioned previously, capacitors, resistors and other parts are sensitive to vibration, therefore, anything we can do to reduce vibration in these components would be sonically beneficial.

children.name: CARDAS PURE COPPER CONNECTORS
children.description:
• Connectors should let the signal through and not interfere with or effect it. Each plug and socket already has

a transitionpoint which must be overcome by the signal. Inferior connectors can act as a filter, which would

then absorb all what you actually want to hear.
